channel.title: 2 Rs glitches
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w82/Albanianbk/Glitchy.jpg[/img] &
[IMG]http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w82/Albanianbk/Rsglitch2.jpg[/img] [I think frell mighta posted this 1]
I've been noticing many new glitches since the update. But I'm sure they will patch em up.

item.title: 2 Rs glitches
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Anti ban - random talking, random tab, random pathways, and break handler which logs me out every 30min for 2min. Many more.
You did say that. But good about it being slightly random, the included one still is better though.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Rs glitches
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:16, topic:217537”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=285871.msg2316336#msg2316336 date=1215307321]

Freaky Forester hat and chat box causes veeery tiny head =D Btw, how long have you been using RSBot on your main? And is that script worth using? Many scripts do not work correctly :<

Like a few days. I was using VialBuyer which has good anti randoms [don’t get to many] and great anti ban. Thats why my main isn’t banned. Yet.

Anti randoms - pretty much everything

Anti ban - random talking, random tab, random pathways, and break handler which logs me out every 30min for 2min. Many more.
[/quote]
Logging out on an exact amount of time for an exact amount of time is like the opposite of an anti ban. It should be random, I think there’s a good break handler that comes default with RSBot.[/quote]
I never said that. It usually stops withing 20-45min of gameplay autoing. And breaks for 1-6mins.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Rs glitches
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:6, topic:217537”][quote author=Tarantula link=topic=285871.msg2316327#msg2316327 date=1215307150]
Freaky Forester hat and chat box causes veeery tiny head =D Btw, how long have you been using RSBot on your main? And is that script worth using? Many scripts do not work correctly :<
[/quote]
Like a few days. I was using VialBuyer which has good anti randoms [don’t get to many] and great anti ban. Thats why my main isn’t banned. Yet.

Anti randoms - pretty much everything

Anti ban - random talking, random tab, random pathways, and break handler which logs me out every 30min for 2min. Many more.[/quote]
Logging out on an exact amount of time for an exact amount of time is like the opposite of an anti ban. It should be random, I think there’s a good break handler that comes default with RSBot.

Read full topic
